fn.p: Abbreviations: FACT-G = Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy-General, HADS = Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale, VAS = Visual Analog Scale.

How to cite this article: Li X, Du G, Liu W, Wang F. Music intervention improves the physical and mental status for patients with breast cancer: a protocol of randomized controlled trial. Medicine. 2020;99:49(e23461).
This study is supported by Natural Science Foundation of Shandong (2018927735).
The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are publicly available.
